<template>

  <v-app>

    <router-view></router-view>

  </v-app>

</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data(){
      return{
        items:[
          { title : "Espace Compagnie Transport" , icon : "mdi-wallet-travel" , link:"/creerOffreVoyage"},
          { title : "Mes réquêtes préenregistrés" , icon : "mdi-clipboard-list-outline" , link:""},
          { title : "Se connecter" , icon : "mdi-account-cog" , link:""},
          { title : "Créer un compte" , icon : "mdi-account-plus" , link:""},
        ],
        date: (new Date(Date.now() - (new Date()).getTimezoneOffset() * 60000)).toISOString().substr(0, 10),
        modal: false,
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style scoped>
  .logo{
    font-weight: bold;
    word-spacing: 2px;
    color: #fff;
  }

  .link{
    color: white;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 17px;
  }

  .container_image{
    background-image: url("../src/assets/inside_bus.jpg");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    height: 500px;
  }

  .search_offers_travels{
    position: relative;
    margin-top: 120px;
    margin-left: 220px;
  }

  .card_subtitle{
    font-size: 15px;
    font-weight: 500;
  }

</style>
